danishPhrase: Vi skal holde min fars 60-års fødselsdag
englishTranslation: We are going to celebrate my father's 60th birthday
We are traveling during Easter vacation

danishPhrase: Vi skal rejse med nattoget til Berlin
englishTranslation: We're traveling by night train to Berlin

danishPhrase: Vi skal se en ny udstilling på kunstmuseet
englishTranslation: We are going to see a new exhibition at the art museum

danishPhrase: Vi skal se et teaterstykke på lørdag aften
englishTranslation: We are going to see a play on Saturday evening

danishPhrase: Vi skal skifte bus ved næste stoppested
englishTranslation: We need to change buses at the next stop

danishPhrase: Vi skal til koncert på fredag aften
englishTranslation: We're going to a concert on Friday evening

danishPhrase: Vi skal tjekke ind to timer før afgang
englishTranslation: We need to check in two hours before departure

danishPhrase: Vi spiller ofte brætspil om søndagen
englishTranslation: We often play board games on Sundays

danishPhrase: Vil du med ud at spise på lørdag?
englishTranslation: Would you like to go out for dinner on Saturday?

danishPhrase: Vinteren har været mildere end normalt i år
englishTranslation: Winter has been milder than normal this year

danishPhrase: Vores busafgang blev forsinket på grund af vejret
englishTranslation: Our bus departure was delayed because of the weather

danishPhrase: Vores hotel ligger tæt på centrum
englishTranslation: Our hotel is located close to the center
Our municipality organizes a summer festival

danishPhrase: Vores nabo spiller høj musik om natten
englishTranslation: Our neighbor plays loud music at night

danishPhrase: Vores opgang er blevet malet for nylig
englishTranslation: Our stairwell has been painted recently

danishPhrase: Vores team har nået alle målene for denne måned
englishTranslation: Our team has reached all the goals for this month

danishPhrase: Vores udlejer har lovet at reparere opvaskemaskinen
englishTranslation: Our landlord has promised to repair the dishwasher
